description.@en: I shall turn you into the oaf you are!

data.distance: Any one person you can clearly see

criticalFailure.@en: Your arms droop to the ground, and your voice turns to a low growl. You cannot cast Spells for the duration.

effect.@en: After successfully casting (and one foe cannot or fails to Resist using Scrutinize), they are temporarily made Helpless for the duration.

reagents.@en: The skin of a rare frog, burnt (expended)
